title: Jessica Alba shows some shoulder in teal as she steps out in between filming LA's Finest season 2
text:
Jessica Alba has recently taken on the buddy cop genre with Gabrielle Union in their new show LA's Finest.

Season two has begun filming in Los Angeles, after the show was renewed in June at Spectrum.

But Alba enjoyed a day off Tuesday as she showed some shoulder while stepping out for lunch with a friend.

Day off: Jessica Alba enjoyed a day off Tuesday from filming LA's Finest as she showed some shoulder while stepping out for lunch with a friend

She looked street style chic in a light teal sweatshirt that hung off one shoulder, paired with matching capri sweats.

The 38-year-old finished the look with a long white scarf, featuring orange stripes, a yellow leather crossbody bag and matching slip-on sandals.

The day before, she shared a fun video from behind the scenes of LA's Finest with co-stars Union, Duane Martin and Zach Gilford.

Alba and Union were in their character's wardrobe while Martin and Gilford wore bulletproof vests, as they all danced in a row to Drake and Lil Baby's Yes Indeed.

Off-the-shoulder: She looked street style chic in a light teal sweatshirt that hung off one shoulder, paired with matching capri sweats

Alba stars in the drama series as working mom Detective Lieutenant Nancy McKenna.

A spin-off of the Bad Boys movies, Union revives her role as Detective Lieutenant Syd Burnett, sister of Martin Lawrence's character Marcus Burnett.

Syd joins the LAPD, where she and her new partner Nancy combine their opposite working styles.

Behind the scenes: The day before, she shared a fun video from behind the scenes of LA's Finest with co-stars Union, Duane Martin and Zach Gilford

In character: Alba and Union were in their character's wardrobe while Martin and Gilford wore bulletproof vests

Dance break: The cast all danced in a row to Drake and Lil Baby's Yes Indeed in between shots

Also executive producers of the show, Alba and Union were able to create their dream roles.

In May, Alba told The Grio: 'For women, this will be a show where you get to see yourself and I think that’s what we wanted to do.

'We wanted to see women that are like us and women that we wanted to hang out with and grab a drink with and bulls*** with and get advice from and all of that.'
description: The day before, she shared a fun video from behind the scenes of LA's Finest with co-stars Union, Duane Martin and Zach Gilford. Alba stars as Detective Lieutenant Nancy McKenna.
